product_name: IFB 1.5 Ton 3 Star Hot and Cold Split Inverter AC
description: Material: Aluminium, Color: White, Capacity: 1.5 Ton, Cooling Capacity: 5050 W, Dimensions: Indoor: 99 cm x 28.7 cm x 37.5 cm (Weight: 11 kg), Outdoor: 89 cm x 65 cm x 38.5 cm (Weight: 31 kg), Power Requirement: AC 230 V, 50 Hz, Annual Electricity Consumption: 1002.83 W, Operating Current: 7.8 A, Ideal For: Home Use, Features: Strong and fast heating in low ambient temperatures up to -15 degrees C, Electronic Control Box (ECB) made from BMC material to prevent fire spreading, R32 refrigerant with low global warming potential and zero ozone depletion potential.
